NATO 556

If you cannot work it out, there seems little point in attempting an explanation in terms you could understand.

 
 I can't work it out because the concept defies physics and reality. Anyone with even a bit of common sense would realize that on their own.
 
 The database is nothing but thousands of pictures of recovered bullets found at crime scenes. The concept of a ballistics database is that every barrel is unique and no two will leave the same marks on a fired bullet. But this notion is dashed to pieces by a little thing we call reality. The wear and tear put on a barrel from firing -not to mention the scratching to the bore done by routine cleaning- will significantly change the ballistic profile and eventually the same barrel won't leave the same marks.
 
 And then there's the fact that the bullets, depending on what their structure is, will deform, break up, or completely fragment upon contact with a hard target, making it impossible to get a good match.
 
 Then we come to the fact that a ballistics database is useless if you have nothing to trace. Right now all the police can do is try and match bullets against other bullets in an attempt to determine which gun was used. But this is useless when gun owners weren't required to submit fired rounds for the police database in the first place. This is even more useless when the criminals won't register their guns, and are unlikely to leave them behind at the crime scene for the police to find.
 
 There's also the fact that shotgun barrels will leave no trace marks behind. Birdshot, buckshot, slugs, etc. they're all fired from smooth bore barrels. You can't perform any sort of comparison with smooth bores, even if you were firing solid slugs. Even if you tried you'd get nothing, because the rounds bounce around inside the barrel and get all banged up and deformed.
 
 And then there's the simple fact that no matter how hard you try, having the police stare at pictures of bullets have no crime fighting potential that will help arrest criminals and break up crime rings.
 
 Now, thimble head, care to try and debunk the facts?

You grasp at straws while putting your faith in political promises and propaganda. I doubt you could tell a cowpattie from a stump?
 
 Your biggest mistake is to depend on these fly by the pants articles filled with sound and fury, signifying...nothing as the Bard would say. Not only that you take it personal although I doubt you submitted the article although it would fit your MO. You don't like our peer review but that is TOUGH. A few of us have been discrediting this stuff probably longer than you have been alive? We seen it all afore and know what rat sign in the sugar bowl is. This stuff you place your bet on is plain rat sign sans the sugar.

 
 Just one small point, retarded liberal is redundant!
Tither

Rival criminal gangs are being forced to share guns, analysis suggests
 
 It would seem that guns are now so scarce in the UK that they are now rented out to both sides of the same conflict.
 
 Discuss!

 
 Lets say for a moment this is true, (not that I believe that their is any less firearms in criminal hands than are necessary). We know for a fact that drug dealers can import anything they want. If they need more weapons they can and will import them. However, and that being the case, how has your good news manifested itself? What has it changed?
 
 Early this week, it was reported. 15 January 2010   BNP member given 11 years for making bombs and guns -- Police found 54 explosive devices from nail bombs to a booby-trapped cigarette packet at Terrance Gavan's home
 
 Bus driver Terrance Gavan manufactured highly dangerous firearms and explosives at the home where he lived with his mother in Batley, West Yorkshire.
 
 Police discovered 54 improvised bombs including nail bombs and a booby-trapped cigarette packet, as well as 12 firearms. 

 
 And last years stats say, 3rd July 2009   The most violent country in Europe: Britain is also worse than South Africa and U.S. 
Britain's violent crime record is worse than any other country in the European union, it has been revealed. 
 
 Official crime figures show the UK also has a worse rate for all types of violence than the U.S. and even South Africa - widely considered one of the world's most dangerous countries.
Doc Jones

HE LOST! just as you have LOST any credibility.
 
 He was pretty petty that we demanded evidence he claimed existed when it did not, could not and would not be present. He was a fake and fraud and you are too. You aren't even smart enough to know the right questions to ask yourself before printing propaganda like that, or regurgitating the exagerated fairy tale. You should be ashamed of yourself for trying to defend it and you are because you obviously know it is so objectionable and unreasonable only someone like you would have the depth of depravity to introduce this excrement as truth and fact.
Doc Jones
